title: Get started
text: A package should use git and be hosted on a remote repository. Below we describe how to use GitHub.

title: Get started
section: Setting up a repository with GitHub pages using usethis
text:
Setting up a repository with GitHub pages using usethis

use_git()
use_github()
use_description()
use_github_action(...)
use_github_pages()

See more in page about GH actions.
